title: How to deactivate suggestions in Grammarly for Windows or Grammarly for Mac
content:
When you see a suggestion thatâ€™s unhelpful, you can click
Dismiss
to ignore it.
However, if you are a Grammarly Premium, Grammarly for Business, or Grammarly for Education user, you can deactivate specific groups of suggestions.
To do this, open your browser and go to
https://account.grammarly.com/customize/suggestions
and switch off a specific group of suggestions. This action will deactivate this group in all of the Grammarly product offerings that you use.
